title: Koi no Yamai ni Tsukeru Kusuri
description: Naoki is a total fan of the famous and hot duo CROSS. Fate gives him a chance to meet his favorite singer and seems to be deeply in love with him...but his co-worker and friend is in love with Naoki so...things are quite frustrating for all of them...

related.title: Koi no Yamai ni Tsukeru Kusuri - Kokuhaku Juumon (Doujinshi)
